text:
I recently had my wisdom tooth removed by Dr. Faisal at Nuffield Dental, and I couldn’t be more pleased with the whole experience. From start to finish, the process was smooth, professional, and painless. Dr. Faisal was very reassuring and took the time to explain everything to me clearly, which put me at ease before the procedure.

The staff at Nuffield Dental were incredibly friendly and empathetic. They made sure I was comfortable throughout my visit and provided detailed explanations about the procedure and the aftercare, so I felt confident going into recovery.

This was actually my second visit to Nuffield for a wisdom tooth extraction, having been treated by a different dentist for the first one. I was pleased to find that the quality of care and consistency of the process were just as excellent as my first visit. It’s comforting to know I can rely on Nuffield Dental for high-quality care every time.

Highly recommend Nuffield Dental, especially if you need a wisdom tooth extraction. Thank you, Dr. Faisal and the wonderful team, for making it such a positive experience!

I was in serious pain when I arrived, but the receptionist kindly helped arrange the earliest possible time slot for me. Big thanks to Dr. Chung for his amazing surgical skills—I barely felt a thing and almost fell asleep during the procedure! He said it would take around half an hour, and it was finished right on time. I'm truly grateful for Dr. Chung's gentle reassurance and exceptional technique—it really helped ease a lot of the pain. For anyone who's ever experienced tooth pain, you know just how unbearable it can be.

I’m currently undergoing Invisalign treatment with Dr. Shauna, and she’s been amazing—super nice and friendly. I was initially worried that the doctor might be too rough or intimidating, but Dr. Shauna has been nothing but patient and professional. My wisdom tooth removal was painless, and I can already see the progress with my Invisalign treatment. It’s definitely been worth the money spent!

It was an emergency cracked tooth situation. Was able to get an appointment within 2 hours. Dr. Seetoh was super patient in addressing my questions and her professionalism and  great skills made the visit a surprisingly pleasant one (considering my deep phobia for dentists). Thank you so much!

Dr. HANNA is a highly experienced doctor who takes the time to explain things thoroughly to her patients. She is very attentive and caring. I felt confident and well taken care of throughout my consultation. I highly recommend Dr. HANNA for her professionalism and empathy.
